CustomField.description: The allocated value of Leave Liability based on the nominated distribution in this record
CustomField.formula: If ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Leave_Accrual' , If ( AND ( tc9_pr__Distribution_Amount__c <> 0 , NOT ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Distribution_Amount__c ) ) ) , tc9_pr__Distribution_Amount__c , Round ( tc9_pr__Pay_Transaction__r.tc9_pr__Leave_Liability_Total__c * tc9_pr__Distribution_Percentage__c , 2 ) ) , 0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The allocated value of Leave Liability based on the nominated distribution in this record
CustomField.label: Leave Liability Value
